src:
Samsung Black Friday 2019: Here Are The First Deals
04 Nov 2019 by Gordon Kelly
This story was written in collaboration with Forbes Finds. Forbes Finds covers products we think you’ll love. Featured products are independently selected and linked to for your convenience. If you buy something using a link on this page, Forbes may receive a small share of that sale.Samsung Black Friday sales are some of the best holiday season deals around. Now with major sales already live from Walmart, from Best Buy, from Amazon and with Apple deals flooding in, Samsung offers are fighting back. Here are the hottest early Black Friday deals you can buy on Galaxy S10 and Note 10 Smartphones, Galaxy tablets, Galaxy smartwatches and 4K UHD TVs right now. 


Samsung Black Friday 2019 sales are now live2019 Getty Images












Apple Black Friday 2019: Here Are The First DealsForbes Gordon Kelly


Samsung Black Friday Galaxy Smartphone Deals


Galaxy Note 10, Galaxy S10 - save $200 with qualified activation on AT&T, Sprint or Verizon - Best Buy - shop deal now (but watch out for Costco’s huge leaked deals)
Galaxy S10 - save $200 with qualified activation on Verizon - Target - shop deal now
Refurbished Samsung Galaxy S10+ - unlocked, 128GB - Walmart - shop deal now



Walmart already has $200 off the Galaxy S10 with qualified activationWalmart


Samsung Black Friday Galaxy Tablet Deals


10.5-inch Galaxy Tab S6 (2019),  128GB, WiFi, Cloud Blue - $599 (save $50) - Amazon - show deal now
10.1-inch Galaxy Tab A (2019) - 32GB, Black - $199 (save $30) - Best Buy - shop deal now


Samsung Black Friday Laptop Deals


15.6-inch Notebook 5 - AMD Ryzen 5, 8 GB RAM, 1 TB HDD - $499 (save $100) - Amazon - shop deal now
13.3-inch Notebook Flash, Full HD, Intel Pentium Silver Processor N5000, 4GB DDR4, 64GB - $299 (save $200) - Walmart - shop deal now
11.6-inch Chromebook 3 - Celeron N3060, 4GB, 16GB SSD - $175.98 (save $124) - Amazon - shop deal now


Amazon Black Friday 2019: Here Are The First DealsForbes Gordon Kelly


Samsung Black Friday Galaxy Watch Deals


Geek Squad Certified Refurbished Galaxy Watch Smartwatch 42mm Stainless Steel - Midnight Black - $247.99 (save $82) - Best Buy - shop deal now
Refurbished Samsung Galaxy Watch SM-R805U 46mm LTE - Silver - $199.97 (save $200) - Walmart - shop deal now



Amazon's time-limited Samsung Q70 Series 4K UHD HDR TV deals is as good as anything you will find on ... [+] Black Friday itselfAmazon


Samsung Black Friday TV Deals


(Note: Time-Limited Deal) 65-Inch QN65Q70RAFXZA QLED 4K Q70 Series Ultra HD Smart TV with HDR and Alexa Compatibility (2019 Model) - $1,197.99 (save $1,000) - Amazon - shop deal now 
 65-Inch QN65Q60RAFXZA QLED 4K Q60 Series Ultra HD Smart TV with HDR and Alexa Compatibility (2019 Model) - $997.99 (save $800) - Amazon - shop deal now
43-inch QN43Q60RAFXZA Q60 Series, 2160p, Smart 4K UHD TV with HDR - $499.99 (save $200) - Best Buy - shop deal now
75-inch UN75NU6900 Class 4K, UHD 2160p LED Smart TV with HDR - $897.99 (save $600) - Walmart - shop deal now


Walmart Black Friday 2019: Here Are The First DealsForbes Gordon Kelly

 While eyes will turn to the Galaxy S10 and Note 10 deals, beware that discounts with be circa $300 (and $400 from Costco) on Black Friday - though expect stock levels at those prices to be extremely limited. Instead, what catches my eye are the superb TV deals available right now which are likely to match anything you will find on Black Friday itself. Only Samsung.com’s typically late entry into Black Friday should give you pause for thought here because it is famed for late and great bargains. 
For my dedicated store-by-store, Black Friday live deals guides you can check out available Amazon deals here, available Best Buy deals here, available Walmart deals here and available Apple deals here. While Black Friday 2019 shipping policies can be found for Amazon (here), Best Buy (here), Target (here) and Walmart (here).



___
Follow Gordon on Twitter and Facebook 

More of my Black Friday Guides on Forbes
